body_html: Ok, I will do a pull request later. I think I need to add a test to apply the fix only in case of gpu usage as it perform an integer to float conversion. As its only on byte I don't think there is a risk of loose of precision but maybe a performance cost.
body_text: Ok, I will do a pull request later. I think I need to add a test to apply the fix only in case of gpu usage as it perform an integer to float conversion. As its only on byte I don't think there is a risk of loose of precision but maybe a performance cost.
body: Ok, I will do a pull request later. I think I need to add a test to apply the fix only in case of gpu usage as it perform an integer to float conversion. As its only on byte I don't think there is a risk of loose of precision but maybe a performance cost.
